name: CodersCoin
description: CodersCoin is a lightweight cryptocurrency aimed at revolutionizing the coding/IT and online creator/influencer industry. By leveraging blockchain technology and the safest hashing methology, CodersCoin seeks to create a global platform that encourages collaboration, rewards skill development, and and chan be exchanged for online products and services. CodersCoin is the money of the People. Although CodersCoin has no value yet, the value will be given in the near future by services, products and contributions in exchange for CSC.
